file.name: pikatrack-openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
    title: Pikatrack API
    version: '0.1'
    description: Work in progress api for pikatrack. Anything here may change without warning until API v1.

tags:
  - name: activity
    description: ''
  - name: section
    description: Sections show paths that activities are matched against
  - name: profile
    description: User profile management and settings 
  - name: admin
    description: Pages restricted for admin users only 

paths:
  /feed:
    get:
      description: Shows your latest Activities. In the future this will show friends activities as well
      responses:
        200:
          description: returns feed
  /profile:
      get:
        tags: [profile]
        description: Shows your account details
        responses:
          200:
            description: todo
      put:
        tags: [profile]
        description: update your account settings
        responses:
          200:
            description: "Account successfully updated"

  /profile/privacy_zone:
    get:
      tags: [profile]
      description: Shows a list of your current privacy zones
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
    post:
      tags: [profile]
      description: Creates a privacy zone
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Privacy zone created"

  /user/:id:
    get:
      description: Shows public details about another user
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /user/:id/activities:
    get:
      description: Shows a list of a users activities you have access to
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /section:
    post:
      tags: [section]
      description: Create a new activity
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /section/:id:
    get:
      tags: [section]
      description: Returns a section
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /section_efforts:
    get:
      tags: [section]
      description: Shows section efforts (A section effort is created automatically when an activity matches with a section)
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /activity:
    post:
      tags: 
        - activity
      description: Create an activity
      responses:
        200:
          description: success

  /activity/:id:
    get:
      tags: 
        - activity
      description: Shows details for an activity
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
    delete:
      tags: 
        - activity
      description: Deletes an activity
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /activity/:id/recompute:
    post:
      tags: 
        - activity
      description: Recomputes an activity. This deletes all computed values and recalculates them. It will also get new segments to show up.
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /auth:
    post:
      description: Sign up
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /auth/new:
    get:
      description: Lets the client know if registrations are enabled
      responses:
        200:
          description: '{signups_enabled: true}'
  /auth/sign_in:
    post:
      description: Sign in
      responses:
        200:
          description: success

  /admin:
    get:
      tags: [admin]
      description: Shows some statistics about the server
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /admin/users?page=:pagenumber:
    get:
      tags: [admin]
      description: displays a list of users
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /admin/users/:id/lock:
    post:
      tags: [admin]
      description: Locks a users account, deletes their current auth tokens and prevents signin.
      responses:
        200:
          description: success
  /admin/users/:id/unlock:
    post:
      tags: [admin]
      description: Unlocks a users account
      responses:
        200:
          description: success

Error: parse: parse spec: parse path items: path "/admin/users?page=:pagenumber": get: at pikatrack-openapi.yaml:145:7: parse path "/admin/users?page=:pagenumber": path MUST NOT contain a query string
